00085     public function write($filename = null, Zend_Config $config = null, $exclusiveLock = null)
00086     {
00087         if ($filename !== null) {
00088             $this->setFilename($filename);
00089         }
00090 
00091         if ($config !== null) {
00092             $this->setConfig($config);
00093         }
00094 
00095         if ($exclusiveLock !== null) {
00096             $this->setExclusiveLock($exclusiveLock);
00097         }
00098 
00099         if ($this->_filename === null) {
00100             require_once 'Zend/Config/Exception.php';
00101             throw new Zend_Config_Exception('No filename was set');
00102         }
00103 
00104         if ($this->_config === null) {
00105             require_once 'Zend/Config/Exception.php';
00106             throw new Zend_Config_Exception('No config was set');
00107         }
00108 
00109         $data        = $this->_config->toArray();
00110         $sectionName = $this->_config->getSectionName();
00111 
00112         if (is_string($sectionName)) {
00113             $data = array($sectionName => $data);
00114         }
00115 
00116         $arrayString = "<?php\n"
00117                      . "return " . var_export($data, true) . ";\n";
00118 
00119         $flags = 0;
00120 
00121         if ($this->_exclusiveLock) {
00122             $flags |= LOCK_EX;
00123         }
00124 
00125         $result = @file_put_contents($this->_filename, $arrayString, $flags);
00126 
00127         if ($result === false) {
00128             require_once 'Zend/Config/Exception.php';
00129             throw new Zend_Config_Exception('Could not write to file "' . $this->_filename . '"');
00130         }
00131     }
